scenario_text.value:
Hmm... This search is proving surprisingly
difficult.

You having trouble too, Falcomon? This is
pretty tough, huh?

Yes. The forest has fruits, nuts, and plants
all over. Here I don’t know what to look for.

But fear not. Minoru is searching as hard as
he can, and despite how he may seem,

Minoru is very knowledgeable. He can find
things in the most unlikely places.

That’s great! Then we can count on Minoru to
turn something up.

Indeed. Now, I will return to my own search.
Best of luck to you both.

Minoru is surprisingly knowledgeable. He’s
sure to find something.
